Sentencas: In modern times, energy transformation sources with superior efficacy and eco-friendliness have become remarkably attractive in terms of fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this regard, graphene-incorporated nanocomposites show strong catalytic activity as anode materials in fuel cells, especially in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a sol-gel protocol was followed for the synthesis of perovskite and graphene-incorporated perovskite anode materials with compositions La0.6Sr0.4Al0.2Cu0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4Al0.2Cu0.8O3-graphene, respectively.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The material properties of the prepared composites were studied using various techniques, such as SEM, FTIR, XRD, EDX, BET, and DSC.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The DSC and BET studies confirmed that the graphene-incorporated perovskite is more stable thermally with a mesoporous structure and a narrow pore size distribution.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conductivities of the materials were studied using a 4-probe DC conductivity technique.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum electrical conductivities attained were 78.7 S cm(-1) at 500 degrees C for La0.6Sr0.4Al0.2Cu0.8O3-graphene and 10.6 S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C for La0.6Sr0.4Al0.2Cu0.8O3.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fuel cell performances were checked via the fabrication of asymmetrical cells comprising three layers, i.e., anode, electrolyte, and cathode materials.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum open circuit voltage (OCV) and power density were obtained as 1.024 V and 513 mW cm(-2) at 550 degrees C with La0.6Sr0.4Al0.2Cu0.8O3-graphene, using air as the oxidant and hydrogen as the fuel.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, this catalytic material could play a vital role in advancing the performances of SOFCs working at low temperatures.
Titulo: Graphene incorporated mesoporous perovskite with excellent conductivity and catalytic activity for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells
